extracted-table.table-caption: Brain connectivity associated with Anger-Out and Anger-In scores

caption.p: Brain connectivity associated with Anger-Out and Anger-In scores

table-wrap-foot.p: For each ROI-to-ROI connection, results on the connectivity without and with effects of anger are reported. In the first case, positive and negative values of T(70) represent positive and negative connectivity between each couple of regions. In the second case, negative values of T(68) represent the negative relationship between the anger scale (Anger-Out or Anger-In) and the specific ROI-to-ROI connectivity.
